description: Terminates any running processes whose executable matches the provided SHA256 hash. Generates an NDJSON report containing details of all killed processes, or indicates if none were found. Uses atomic logging with .new fallback if locked.

script_parameters.name: TargetHash
script_parameters.description: SHA256 hash of the executable to match and terminate.

script_parameters.name: LogPath
script_parameters.description: Path to the rotating human-readable script log.

script_parameters.name: ARLog
script_parameters.description: Active Response NDJSON output path (atomic overwrite; falls back to .new if locked).
